name: Core x Core
description:
Edit : There was a UI Scaling issue which caused the game to become very hard to play. There was a small time extension because of technical difficulties people were having. The application has been replaced with the bug fix. The only change is the bug fix, thank you for your cooperation .

What is this Game?

Core x Core is a Fast Paced 2D Game, Where You Destroy Enemies to protect Two Cores, The Goal The Enemies Try To Destroy.  Killing Enemies Rewards You Gold, Which You Can Use To Buy Items, Power-ups, and Health For The Cores.

How Does It Fit With The Theme?

The Entire Game Revolves Around The Dynamic Nature Of Having Two Objectives for the Enemies, Making it Harder and More Interesting.

What About Assets?

All Art and Code was Made During The Jam Period. The Music was Made By A Friend, Before The Jam, However.  I Couldn't Make My Own Song...

Are You A Beginner? 

This Is My First Game Published To itch.io, and I Only Have Around 2-3 Months Worth Of Game Dev Knowledge, so, at least to me, I Am.

I hope you enjoy the game! It was a crazy journey to get to this point, but i'm glad i'm here now. I have every intention of playing as many other Jam Games as possible, right after I get some sleep :)
